entry.title: Blogging Again!
entry.summary: I've been an active blogger since 2011 up until 2016 where I talked about various things – life events, some tech stuff and my scholarship interview experiences. I stopped blogging when I started my International Baccalaureate (IB) diploma program. Throughout my undergraduate years, I channel most of my writing energy answering …
entry.content: I've been an active blogger since 2011 up until 2016 where I talked about various things – life events, some tech stuff and my scholarship interview experiences. I stopped blogging when I started my International Baccalaureate (IB) diploma program. Throughout my undergraduate years, I channel most of my writing energy answering IB questions on Quora and writing my notes using LaTeX. Today, I've decided to start blogging again, focusing on math, statistics and ML.

entry.title: Linear models (part 1)
entry.content:
Summary: A series discussing linear regression models.

Here, we discuss linear regression models.
